sentence.Network_en: Pentecost: Feast of the Harvest, first fruits. New life!
sentence.Network_cn: 五旬节: 收割节, 初熟的果子. 新的生命!

sentence.Network_en: Called Pentecost, Feast of Weeks or Shavuot also called Whitsunday.
sentence.Network_cn: 叫作圣灵降灵节是禁食的星期或者五旬节也叫作圣灵降灵节.

sentence.Network_en: Pentecostals take their name from the biblical feast of the Pentecost.
sentence.Network_cn: 五旬节派是以圣经上的五旬节而得名的.

entry.tran: （基督教的）圣灵降临节（复活节后第7个星期日）
entry.def: Pen- tecost is a Christian festival that takes place on the seventh Sunday after Easter and celebrates the sending of the Holy Spirit to the first followers of Christ.

entry.tran: （犹太教的）五旬节（逾越节后第50天举行的庆祝丰收的节日）
entry.def: Pentecost is a Jewish festival that takes place 50 days after Passover and celebrates the harvest.

means.word_mean: 1. seventh Sunday after Easter; commemorates the emanation of the Holy Spirit to the apostles; a quarter day in Scotland
2. (Judaism) Jewish holy day celebrated on the sixth of Sivan to celebrate Moses receiving the Ten Commandments
